title: Mortgage Data Privacy Investigations
description: We are investigating several mortgage companies that may have violated privacy laws by using internet tracking software called pixels to collect and disclose sensitive information tied to online loan applications and loan inquiries without customer consent.

title: Healthcare Insurance Investigation
description: We are investigating whether health insurance companies may have violated the law by failing to obtain the most cost-effective healthcare options for you and other employees.

title: Blackstone Fake Discount Investigation
description: We are currently investigating Blackstone for allegedly displaying fake discounts for products sold on its website, ranging from its wetsuits to the rest of its product line.

title: Gig Economy Driver Rights
description: Gig drivers are claiming the employers led them to believe that they would be truly independent workers â€“ not subject to the direction and control of the company.

title: RXSugar GLP-1 Boosters Deceptive Advertising Claims
description: We are investigating whether RXSugar may have violated consumer protection laws by comparing the effects of their booster supplements to actual GLP-1 agonists like Ozempic and potentially giving consumers the false impression that they can achieve similar results.
